hero.title: In the heart of the Bolgheri countryside
hero.subtitle: A simple agriturismo, with simple people, in a beautiful place!

booking.title: Booking Now!
booking.subtitle: You can only find the best price on our website.

content1_home.title: Immersed in the vineyards of Bolgheri
content1_home.text1: The holiday farm is situated at the end of a country road (very smooth), where rumors do not exist.
content1_home.text2: It is a family run business that lies in Bolgheri, in Tuscany, at the feet of Castagneto Carducci hills, in the open countryside surrounded by vineyards and olive groves, at about 6 km from the sea.
